Articles.Content: Hello, im running 1.11 & when i pitch up/down with w/s the game banks left/right a/d. What to do?

Check the control settings in the main menu options. Alternatively, have you accidentally changed the keyboard language in windows? I kept knocking mine into US by mistake so “#” wouldn’t work properly for example.

On 5/30/2021 at 7:37 PM, FruitGoose said:

Check the control settings in the main menu options. Alternatively, have you accidentally changed the keyboard language in windows? I kept knocking mine into US by mistake so “#” wouldn’t work properly for example.

It was a MechJeb bug, thanks anyway!
